variant.p: If an entity uses fair value in its opening IFRS statement of financial position as deemed cost for an item of property, plant and equipment, an investment property, an intangible asset or a right‑of‑use asset (see paragraphs D5 and D7), the entity’s first IFRS financial statements shall disclose, for each line item in the opening IFRS statement of financial position:

li.p: the aggregate of those fair values; and
the aggregate adjustment to the carrying amounts reported under previous GAAP.
